name: Mushroom Duxelles
recipeInstructions: 1. Heat the clarified butter in a pan over a medium heat.
2. Add the mushrooms and lemon juice and cook, stirring from time to time, until all the moisture has evaporated.
3. Add the shallot and cook for another 2 minutes, then pour in the cream and cook, stirring, until it is all absorbed.
4. Add the chopped parley and season to taste. Set aside to cool, then chill.
